descriptionMdByRank.1: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by **8**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
descriptionMdByRank.2: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by **9**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
descriptionMdByRank.3: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by **10**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
descriptionMdByRank.4: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by **11**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
descriptionMdByRank.5: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by **12**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
